publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1819# Karen Whitefield: Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal by fans of Airdrieonians Football Club to establish a supporters’ trust; wishes those supporters success in their endeavours, and recognises the important role played by local football teams in nurturing and maintaining a sense of community spirit and pride.
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Elaine Thomson*

S1M-1819# Karen Whitefield: Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal by fans of Airdrieonians Football Club to establish a supporters’ trust; wishes those supporters success in their endeavours, and recognises the important role played by local football teams in nurturing and maintaining a sense of community spirit and pride. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Dr Elaine Murray, Irene McGugan, Elaine Thomson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mike Watson*
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Paul Martin*, Fergus Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Butler*, Hugh Henry*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Duncan McNeil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Janis Hughes*, David Mundell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Des McNulty*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Patricia Ferguson*
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Ian Jenkins*, Mr John McAllion*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S1M-1819# Karen Whitefield: Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal by fans of Airdrieonians Football Club to establish a supporters’ trust; wishes those supporters success in their endeavours, and recognises the important role played by local football teams in nurturing and maintaining a sense of community spirit and pride. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Dr Elaine Murray, Irene McGugan, Elaine Thomson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mike Watson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Michael McMahon, Paul Martin, Fergus Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Margaret Jamieson, Bill Butler, Hugh Henry, Marilyn Livingstone, Scott Barrie, Mr Duncan McNeil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Janis Hughes, David Mundell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Des McNulty, Mr Brian Monteith, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Patricia Ferguson, Mr Gil Paterson, Ian Jenkins, Mr John McAllion, Mr Murray Tosh, Cathy Peattie, Mr Frank McAveety, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Cathy Jamieson*
S1M-1819# Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust (lodged on 2 April 2001) Dennis Canavan*

S1M-1819# Karen Whitefield: Airdrie FC Supporters' Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal by fans of Airdrieonians Football Club to establish a supporters’ trust; wishes those supporters success in their endeavours, and recognises the important role played by local football teams in nurturing and maintaining a sense of community spirit and pride.
